title: runtime: "spinning with local work"
body: Several of the builders have started crashing sometimes with "fatal error: spinning with local work". Here's the earliest one: http://build.golang.org/log/ed94ee0fce2dfcdf7cfca23716438f7f19596db2 (linux-386-387 on 0e6a6c510f87). This is presumably the fault of e870f06c3f49, which changed the scheduler to hand off the remainder of the time slice to the most recently ready()d G.
